name: Parrot AR Drone and Gyro Flyer Video
summary: Transitional video format created by various models of the Parrot AR Drone and Gyro Flyer, a radio controlled flying quadcopter helicopter built by the French company Parrot; mp4.infovid files are created because the Parrot iOS recording app records to one format, then converts it to .MP4 as soon as the recording process is stopped.
